data.title: Early Round Paint Shells to Garage From Yellow
data.description: Start your round with this Paint Shells lineup to isolate Attackers looking to take B Long control. You can also use this to take Initiators off their utility, or potentially kill them.

data.title: A Site To A Nest Tower Paintshells
data.description: This is useful for either doing damage to players in the tower in A Nest, or potentially getting a pick there, especially if a player there is low.
